Parameters: The initial contents. The provided contents must have been obtained through @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveApi#newDriveContents_E@. This @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@ cannot be reused after this method returns. This parameter may also be set to null to create an empty file, but it is recommended to create non-empty files where the mime-type does not support having a zero byte file (for example, image or PDF files).
setInitialDriveContents(com.google.andro.Description: Sets the initial @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@ for the new file. This will persist the contents as the initial contents for the file. To continue editing the contents, open them again through @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveFile#open_E@ once the file has been created. This method must always be called or the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@ method will fail. If this method is called multiple times before @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@, the last call will overwrite any previous value.

setActivityStartFolder(com.google.androi.Description: Sets the default folder that will be presented at activity startup as the location for file creation. The activity supports navigation from this point to other folders. If not set, defaults to the root folder in the user's Drive. If this method is called multiple times before @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@, the last call will overwrite any previous value.

setInitialMetadata(com.google.android.gm.Description: Sets the initial metadata for the new file. This method must be called or the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@ method will fail. A new @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet_E@ can be created using @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet#Builder_E@. If this method is called multiple times before @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@, the last call will overwrite any previous value.

Parameters: The @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@ to service the call. The client must be connected before invoking this method and must have a scope to create files in the target directory (e.g. @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#Drive#SCOPE_FILE_E@).
build(com.google.android.gms.common.api..Description: Gets an Intent that can be used to start the Create File activity. Note that you must start this activity with startIntentSenderForResult, not startIntentSender. Once this is invoked, the provided contents are finalized and cannot be edited. To make additional edits, reopen the contents with the returned DriveId.

Parameters: the title to set on the activity (may not be null)
setActivityTitle(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the title displayed in the activity. If this method is called multiple times before @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@, the last call will overwrite any previous value.

ClassDesc: A builder that is used to configure and display the create file activity. This dialog creates a new file in the user's drive with a destination and file title selected by the user. If the device is currently offline, the file will be created locally and committed to the server when connectivity is restored. To create a new @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveFile_E@, the following objects should be provided through the setters in this class before @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@ is called: @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveContents_E@, created using @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveApi#newDriveContents_E@, used to write the file contents, and provided here through @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#setInitialDriveContents_E@. @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet_E@, created through a @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#MetadataChangeSet#Builder_E@, used to specify the initial file metadata and provided here through @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#setInitialMetadata_E@. To display the activity, pass the result of @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#build_E@ to #startIntentSenderForResult(). When the activity completes, a successful response will include an extra @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#CreateFileActivityBuilder#EXTRA_RESPONSE_DRIVE_ID_E@ that specifies the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveId_E@ for the newly created file. Note: you cannot use #startIntentSender to invoke the activity. This will fail.
